main event: Multiple reports of an unidentified flying object in Greenfield, California, observed by local police and residents on December 14, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as very brilliant and approximately 10,000 feet in altitude., Police officers observed the object for more than 90 minutes, confirming its size as 50 to 75 feet in diameter., There were no detectable emissions or interference with police radio equipment during observation., The object appeared similar to a ball of fire and had stationary behavior., The incident was reported to multiple military and civilian organizations for further investigation.
sighted object: A brilliant light or glowing object in the sky
witness description: Police officers from the Greenfield Police Department and King City Police Department.
